itemDisplayName: Deploys SQL Server 2014 AlwaysOn FCI on existing VNET & AD
description: This template creates three new Azure VMs on an existing VNET: Two VMs are configured as SQL Server 2014 AlwaysOn FCI cluster nodes and one VM is configured as a File Share Witness for automated cluster failover. Azure Files is configured as a shared storage location for each cluster node.  In addition to these VMs, the following additional Azure resources are also configured: Internal Load Balancer, Storage accounts, Azure Files Shares.  To configure the cluster within each VM, PowerShell DSC is leveraged.  For Active Directory support, existing Active Directory domain controllers should already be deployed on the existing VNET.
summary: This template creates 3 Azure VMs for a SQL Server AlwaysOn FCI cluster on an existing Azure VNET and Active Directory domain
